job.description:
{"@context": "http://schema.org", "@type": "JobPosting", "datePosted": "2021-07-29T11:12:05.000Z", "description": "

Data Scientist

This position is expected to carry out sophisticated operations to analyze, model, and build predictions based on organized disordered data.


He or she will work closely with leaders in Data Analytics and Engineering to work with statistical programming, machine learning and artificial intelligence methods to help our client understand their members, clients and operations with precision.


They should therefore be capable of complex and creative problem solving with the ability to complete difficult projects that fulfill our clients outcomes-based mission.


The ability to coalesce multiple, sometimes divergent, data sets to fulfill the visualization and analysis of an outcome (mortality, readmissions e.g.) is required.


Creative solutions are encouraged and immersive experiences preferred.

- Primary skills for this position include those requisites for developing products that use data to enable analyses, information delivery and interaction with users. Successful candidates should have a good understanding of a statistical programming language consistent with data science and machine learning including Python or R. Our team includes a mix of R or Python.

- Knowledge of information architecture (as defined in the field of design as well as the field of data architecture) is preferred to enable the candidate to construct analyses with complex data sets when data engineering resources are unavailable.


Requirements


\u00b7        Minimum Bachelor\u2019s Computer Science, Business, Statistics, Information Sciences, Healthcare, Design, Engineering

\u00b7        Preferred Master\u2019s in Public Health, Computer Science, Informatics, Analytics, Statistics, Engineering, Biostatistics

\u00b7        Healthcare experience preferred but not required.

\u00b7        Demonstrable skill with R or Python in a data science environment is required.

\u00b7        Demonstrable skill building models with an appropriate understanding of results and an ability to monitor model performance over time is essential.

\u00b7        Ability to work with data science teams to assist in delivery of analytical outcomes and models.

\u00b7        Ability to perform analysis of clinical data with stakeholders and users to deliver actionable insights.

\u00b7        Ability to design and develop classical statistical and advanced machine learning models

\u00b7        Experience with supervised and unsupervised model development

\u00b7        Ability to generate a quality work product in a timely manner while maintaining a strong attention to detail.

\u00b7        Work closely with end users to design impactful analyses with a variety of methodologies.

\u00b7        Strong communication skills to enable the developer to interview users and enhance the user experience.

\u00b7        Identify and communicate operational impact of analytical findings/decision support.

\u00b7        Support other members of the team with the ability to explain methodologies and assist in development.

\u00b7        Be a strong learner with the understanding of continuous professional and technical improvement of skills and techniques.
